projects.title: Cloud Notes
projects.description: Cloud Notes is a multi-platform note taking application with some advanced features for better organising of notes and increase efficiency in day to day tasks. Cloud Notes is an Android project built with React-Native based on a Note taking app with some extended features like Cloud syncing, In-App Extensions, Task Management with built-in UI customization

aboutpara: I am Pankaj Israni, an experienced Android Developer based in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. With a strong background in Java, Kotlin, and React Native, I specialize in developing intuitive and efficient mobile applications. My portfolio includes projects like the Tech-Fly Online Exam app and the Cloud Notes app and Noted! App, where I focus on delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions. I am committed to continuous learning and innovation, always striving to enhance the user experience. When I'm not working on development, I enjoy reading and networking to broaden my perspectives.

resume.description: Highly motivated and skilled Android Developer with hands-on experience in designing and building robust mobile applications. Proficient in Java, Kotlin, and React Native, with a strong understanding of modern development frameworks and UI/UX design principles. Demonstrated success in delivering high-quality apps, including the Tech-Fly Online Exam App and Cloud Notes App. Adept at integrating APIs, managing databases with Firebase, and using tools like Android Studio and Figma to create user-focused solutions. A quick learner with a passion for continuous improvement, seeking to contribute expertise to dynamic projects and forward-thinking teams.
